summary: nice looking Heavy Armor for CBBE
descriptionHtml:
A Heavy Armor for CBBEv2 and full compatible with all patches. extract to the Data folder and activate the .esp file on NMM or in Skyrim Launcher.

[IMG]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/3853/tesv2012082521583999.jpg[/IMG]

You can forge them in Deadric section or you type in Console:

Help Skimpy 
or
Player.additem 2C7777E3  (Armor)
                     2C7777E4  (Boots)
                     2C7777E5  (Gauntlets)


have Fun! :)

i found this file on my Hard drive.Last year i downloaded many File from the WWW. This mod is untraceable in Internet and i think i share them with all of You.

Credit goes to Orion1167!
author: Barscheck
